body_html: Running Jupyter with a Python3 kernel resolved this for me. Noting that fileno() for Python3 raises a different exception than Python2, there may be something fishy in the stream.
body_text: Running Jupyter with a Python3 kernel resolved this for me. Noting that fileno() for Python3 raises a different exception than Python2, there may be something fishy in the stream.
body: Running Jupyter with a Python3 kernel resolved this for me. Noting that fileno() for [Python3](https://docs.python.org/3/library/io.html#io.IOBase.fileno) raises a different exception than [Python2](https://docs.python.org/2/library/io.html#io.IOBase.fileno), there may be something fishy in the stream.
